channel.title: Weeknotes on 🌀 bledleys blog
channel.description: Recent content in Weeknotes on 🌀 bledleys blog

item.title: Week Notes 2025-W28
item.description:
Wins ⭐

  • Created a series of promotional posts, bio’s and images for performers at a gig next week

  • Implemented an invisible Waybar module that calls my email syncing script. It calls mbsync and does some initial notmuch tagging. Another custom module shows a simple indicator for new and unread mail.

  • Adding many blogs, socials accounts and YouTube channels to my RSS reader to seriously reduce use of distracting, bloated websites.

Reading 📚

  • Finished reading Mastering Emacs by Mickey Peterson. I did skim over some parts as this is more of a reference book.

Writing ✍🏻

  • Posted to the blog ‘Being Less Evil’ about disabling evil-mode in Doom Emacs.

Health 💪🏻

  • I got a couple of short but fairly lame runs in. The heat has been pretty wild this week. If I don’t get out early I’ll likely not go at all.

Watching 📽

  • Watched PSG v Real Madrid but tuned in late and missed all the goals.
